summary: An analysis of the construction mechanism for the magic in dominant narrative cinema though the filming of El conde Drácula (1970), a commercial film by Jesús Franco.
cast: Christopher Lee|Herbert Lom|Soledad Miranda|Jack Taylor|Emma Cohen|Jesús Franco|Colette Jack|Jeannine Mestre|Paul Muller|Maria Rohm|Fred Williams
title: Vampir Cuadecuc
